name: Helinox Ground Sheet Swivel Chair
description: It happens – you hit the beach, set up your favorite chair... and proceed to steadily sink into the sand. Beach day, ruined. Thankfully, this sturdy ground sheet attaches to your Helinox Swivel Chair for a pleasant beachside throne experience. Not today, sand.Chair legs slide into corner pockets of sheet for security.Securely attaches to the center of the chair for a confidence-inspiring fit.
